languages.text: "На этих мутантах нет благословенной санкции Империума, но нет и анафемы. Должны ли мы приговаривать их, не разобравшись? Существуют мутанты, существование которых санкционировано — огрины, ратлинги, парии, пелагеры, фелиниды, троты. В нашей библиотеке было много трудов по искусству Генеторов, и я могла бы поделиться с твоими слугами некоторыми знаниями в этой области... теоретическими".

traits.locale_text: "На этих мутантах нет благословенной санкции Империума, но нет и анафемы. Должны ли мы приговаривать их, не разобравшись? Существуют мутанты, существование которых санкционировано — огрины, ратлинги, парии, пелагеры, фелиниды, троты. В нашей библиотеке было много трудов по искусству Генеторов, и я могла бы поделиться с твоими слугами некоторыми знаниями в этой области... теоретическими".

languages.text: "The blessed sanction of the Imperium does not grace these mutants, but nor does it declare their existence anathema. Should we sentence them without further study? There are mutants whose existence is fully sanctioned, such as Ogryns, Ratlings, Pariahs, Pelagers, Felinids, or Troths. Our library had many treatises on the Genetors' craft, and I could impart some of that knowledge to your servants... purely theoretical, of course."
languages.original_text: "На этих мутантах нет благословенной санкции Империума, но нет и анафемы. Должны ли мы приговаривать их, не разобравшись? Существуют мутанты, существование которых санкционировано — огрины, ратлинги, парии, пелагеры, фелиниды, троты. В нашей библиотеке было много трудов по искусству Генеторов, и я могла бы поделиться с твоими слугами некоторыми знаниями в этой области... теоретическими".

traits.locale_text: "The blessed sanction of the Imperium does not grace these mutants, but there is no anathema either. Should we sentence them without understanding? There are mutants whose existence is fully sanctioned, such as Ogryns, Ratlings, Pariahs, Pelagers, Felinids, or Troths. Our library had many treatises on the craft of the Genetors, and I could impart some of that knowledge to your servants... purely theoretical, of course."

"Does the Creed not command us to fight such deviations? The blessed sanction of the Imperium does not grace these mutants, so we must purge Janus from both the obvious wretches and the latent carriers. Our library had many treatises on the craft of the Genetors, and I could impart some of that knowledge to your servants... Purely theoretical, of course."

"The blessed sanction of the Imperium does not grace these mutants, but there is no anathema either. Should we sentence them without understanding? There are mutants whose existence is fully sanctioned, such as Ogryns, Ratlings, Pariahs, Pelagers, Felinids, or Troths. Our library had many treatises on the craft of the Genetors, and I could impart some of that knowledge to your servants... purely theoretical, of course."

Our library had many treatises on the Genetors' craft, and I could impart some of that knowledge to your servants... purely theoretical, of course."

There are mutants whose existence is fully sanctioned, such as Ogryns, Ratlings, Pariahs, Pelagers, Felinids, or Troths. Our library had many treatises on the Genetors' craft, and I could impart some of that knowledge to your servants... purely theoretical, of course."

languages.text: “帝国的神圣制裁并没有眷顾这些变种人，但也没有宣称他们的存在是诅咒。难道我们不应该在进一步的研究之后，再进行决断吗？某些变种人的存在是完全合法的，比如欧格林、莱特林、无魂者、佩拉格、猫人和特罗斯。我们的图书馆里有很多基因士的论文，我可以将其中一部分知识传授给你的仆人……当然，这些都只是理论知识。”
languages.original_text: "The blessed sanction of the Imperium does not grace these mutants, but nor does it declare their existence anathema. Should we sentence them without further study? There are mutants whose existence is fully sanctioned, such as Ogryns, Ratlings, Pariahs, Pelagers, Felinids, or Troths. Our library had many treatises on the Genetors' craft, and I could impart some of that knowledge to your servants... purely theoretical, of course."

traits.locale_text: “帝国的神圣制裁并没有眷顾这些变种人，但也没有宣称他们的存在是诅咒。难道我们不应该在进一步的研究之后，再进行决断吗？某些变种人的存在是完全合法的，比如欧格林、莱特林、弃民、佩拉格、猫人和特罗斯。我们的图书馆里有很多基因士的论文，我可以将其中一部分知识传授给你的仆人……当然，这些都只是理论知识。”

languages.text: «La bendita absolución del Imperium no agrada a estos mutantes, pero tampoco declara su existencia anatema. ¿Deberíamos sentenciarlos sin más preámbulos? Hay mutantes cuya existencia está totalmente permitida, como los Ogretes, Rátidos, Parias, Pelagers, Felinids o Troths. Nuestra biblioteca tenía muchos tratados sobre el oficio de los Genetors, y yo podría impartir algo de ese conocimiento a sus sirvientes... puramente teórico, por supuesto».
languages.original_text: "The blessed sanction of the Imperium does not grace these mutants, but nor does it declare their existence anathema. Should we sentence them without further study? There are mutants whose existence is fully sanctioned, such as Ogryns, Ratlings, Pariahs, Pelagers, Felinids, or Troths. Our library had many treatises on the Genetors' craft, and I could impart some of that knowledge to your servants... purely theoretical, of course."

traits.locale_text: «La bendita absolución del Imperium no agrada a estos mutantes, pero tampoco declara su existencia anatema. ¿Deberíamos sentenciarlos sin más preámbulos? Hay mutantes cuya existencia está totalmente permitida, como los Ogretes, Rátidos, Parias, Pelagers, Felinids o Troths. Nuestra biblioteca tenía muchos tratados sobre el oficio de los Genetors, y yo podría impartir algo de ese conocimiento a sus sirvientes... puramente teórico, por supuesto».

languages.text: 「帝国の祝福はこれらの変異体には及びませんが、彼らの存在を忌み嫌うことを宣言するわけでもありません。これ以上研究せずに刑に処すべきでしょうか？オグリン、ラットリング、パーリア、亜人種、フェリニッド、トロスなど、その存在が完全に認定されている変異体がいます。私たちのライブラリには遺伝学者の技術に関する専門書がたくさん所蔵されており、その知識をあなたの従者に教えることができるでしょう...もちろん、純粋に理論的に」
languages.original_text: "The blessed sanction of the Imperium does not grace these mutants, but nor does it declare their existence anathema. Should we sentence them without further study? There are mutants whose existence is fully sanctioned, such as Ogryns, Ratlings, Pariahs, Pelagers, Felinids, or Troths. Our library had many treatises on the Genetors' craft, and I could impart some of that knowledge to your servants... purely theoretical, of course."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国の祝福はこれらの変異体には及びませんが、彼らの存在を忌み嫌うことを宣言するわけでもありません。これ以上研究せずに刑に処すべきでしょうか？オグリン、ラットリング、パーリア、亜人種、フェリニッド、トロスなど、その存在が完全に認定されている変異体がいます。私たちのライブラリには遺伝学者の技術に関する専門書がたくさん所蔵されており、その知識をあなたの従者に教えることができるでしょう...もちろん、純粋に理論的に」

languages.text: « L'existence de ces mutants n'a certes pas reçu la bénédiction sacrée de l'Imperium, mais ils ne sont pas frappés du sceau de l'hérésie pour autant. Est-il avisé de les condamner sans enquête complémentaire ? Après tout, d'autres mutants ont reçu des agréments : les Ogryns, les Ratlings, les Parias, les Piscéens, les Félinides ou les Troths... Notre bibliothèque contenait de nombreux traités décrivant l'art des genetors, et je pourrais transmettre certaines de ces connaissances à vos serviteurs... De façon purement théorique, bien entendu. »
languages.original_text: "The blessed sanction of the Imperium does not grace these mutants, but nor does it declare their existence anathema. Should we sentence them without further study? There are mutants whose existence is fully sanctioned, such as Ogryns, Ratlings, Pariahs, Pelagers, Felinids, or Troths. Our library had many treatises on the Genetors' craft, and I could impart some of that knowledge to your servants... purely theoretical, of course."

traits.locale_text: « L'existence de ces mutants n'a certes pas reçu la bénédiction sacrée de l'Imperium, mais ils ne sont pas frappés du sceau de l'hérésie pour autant. Est-il avisé de les condamner sans enquête complémentaire ? Après tout, d'autres mutants ont reçu des agréments : les Ogryns, les Ratlings, les Parias, les Piscéens, les Félinides ou les Troths... Notre bibliothèque contenait de nombreux traités décrivant l'art des genetors, et je pourrais transmettre certaines de ces connaissances à vos serviteurs... De façon purement théorique, bien entendu. »

languages.text: "Die heilige Sanktion des Imperiums billigt diese Mutanten nicht, erklärt ihre Existenz aber auch nicht zum Anathema. Sollten wir sie ohne weiteres Studium verurteilen? Es gibt Mutanten, deren Existenz vollständig sanktioniert sind, beispielsweise Ogryns, Rattlinge, Parias, Pelagen, Feliniden oder Troths. Unsere Bibliothek enthielt viele Abhandlungen über das Handwerk der Genetoren, und ich könnte einen Teil dieses Wissens an Eure Diener weitergeben ... auf rein theoretischer Basis, versteht sich."
languages.original_text: "The blessed sanction of the Imperium does not grace these mutants, but nor does it declare their existence anathema. Should we sentence them without further study? There are mutants whose existence is fully sanctioned, such as Ogryns, Ratlings, Pariahs, Pelagers, Felinids, or Troths. Our library had many treatises on the Genetors' craft, and I could impart some of that knowledge to your servants... purely theoretical, of course."

traits.locale_text: "Die heilige Sanktion des Imperiums billigt diese Mutanten nicht, erklärt ihre Existenz aber auch nicht zum Anathema. Sollten wir sie ohne weiteres Studium verurteilen? Es gibt Mutanten, deren Existenz vollständig sanktioniert sind, beispielsweise Ogryns, Rattlinge, Parias, Pelagen, Feliniden oder Troths. Unsere Bibliothek enthielt viele Abhandlungen über das Handwerk der Genetoren, und ich könnte einen Teil dieses Wissens an Eure Diener weitergeben ... auf rein theoretischer Basis, versteht sich."

languages.text: "İmparatorluk'un kutsanmış onayı, bu mutantlara lütfunu sunmuyor ancak varlıklarını lanetli olarak da görmüyor. Yeteri kadar incelemeden onları cezalandırmamız mı gerek? Ogrinler, Yarıfareler, Paryalar, Pelagerler, Kedigiller ve Trotlar gibi varlıkları tamamen onaylanan mutantlar mevcut. Kütüphanemizde Genetörlerin zanaatı üzerine nice tezler mevcut. Ben de bu irfanın bir kısmını hizmetkârlarına aktarabilirim. Tabii ki tamamen kuramsal açıdan..."
languages.original_text: "The blessed sanction of the Imperium does not grace these mutants, but nor does it declare their existence anathema. Should we sentence them without further study? There are mutants whose existence is fully sanctioned, such as Ogryns, Ratlings, Pariahs, Pelagers, Felinids, or Troths. Our library had many treatises on the Genetors' craft, and I could impart some of that knowledge to your servants... purely theoretical, of course."
